document.full_text: what made raj rajaratnam, who was convicted of fraud and conspiracy wednesday, stand out in the hedge fund world was his deep set of contacts inside executive suites and on trading floors.
document.title: galleon chief's web of friends proved crucial to scheme
lines_and_colors: what made raj rajaratnam, who was convicted of fraud and conspiracy wednesday, stand out in the hedge fund world was his deep set of contacts inside executive suites and on trading floors.
